caseTitle: Hashmat Ullah v. The State & another
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE ASIF SAEED KHAN KHOSA
tagline: A perusal of section 9(a)(x) of the National Accountability Ordinance, 1999 shows that the relevant offence is attracted only if the accused person is proved to have committed the offence of criminal breach of trust as defined in section 405, P.P.C. and if there was an entrustment of property involved in the matter.
